entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 4. POP 30%
